properties.name: star_average
properties.label: Star Average of score signals
properties.description: Measures the overall average rating across relevant sites

properties.name: review_volume
properties.label: Review Volume of score signals
properties.description: Measures the total number of reviews for a given location

properties.name: review_recency
properties.label: Review Recency of score signals
properties.description: Measures the recency of reviews across various sites

properties.name: review_length
properties.label: Review Length of score signals
properties.description: Measures the percentage of reviews considered long

properties.name: review_spread
properties.label: Review Spread of score signals
properties.description: Measures how well your reviews are distributed across all major sites

properties.name: review_response
properties.label: Review Response of score signals
properties.description: Measures the percentage of reviews that are responded to versus reviews with no response

properties.name: search_impression
properties.label: Search Impression of score signals
properties.description: Measures how well your business's information ranks in the first page of search results

properties.name: listing_accuracy
properties.label: Listing Accuracy of score signals
properties.description: Measures the accuracy of your business listings across all major sites

properties.name: social_engagement
properties.label: Social Engagement of score signals
properties.description: Measure engagement on Facebook based on views, fans, likes, and engaged users
